text: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ وَمَا يَكۡفُرُ بِهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

translation.en: And We have certainly revealed to you verses [which are] clear proofs, and no one would deny them except the defiantly disobedient
translation.id: Dan sungguh, Kami telah menurunkan ayat-ayat yang jelas kepadamu (Muhammad), dan tidaklah ada yang mengingkarinya selain orang-orang fasik
